items.content_html: Explore Kubernetes features with ease using kube-demo. This repository contains all necessary Kubernetes resources for deploying and managing a lightweight application within a Kubernetes cluster. Ideal for hands-on demonstrations and learning Kubernetes orchestration.

This repository contains all necessary Kubernetes resources for deploying and managing a lightweight application within a Kubernetes cluster. Ideal for hands-on demonstrations and learning Kubernetes orchestration.
